description:
A bunch of juicy-looking blueberries.
Recovers 15% life on pickup, and more life/tech over time!
name: Blueberries

description:
A scrumptious bunch of blackberries.
Recovers 15% magi on pickup, and more magi/tech over time!
name: Blackberries

description:
You're pretty sure this is a banana, but the locals call it a banaberry.
Restores allies from the dead with 15% of their life and magi!
name: Banaberry

description:
Restores life to max and revives all dead members.
Made from the rarest of fae parts.
name: Serum

description:
Restores magi to max and purges all standard ailments.
Made from the rarest of gelatin bits.
name: Ether

description:
An elixir of sorts that regenerates over time by extracting electrons from the air to recompose itself.
Potent enough to revive the dead, but slaps your tool slot with a wildly long \C[1]five minute cooldown\C[0]; always a last resort!
name: Draught

description:
A small heartfruit, though ambrosial, is barely ripe.
Heals 40% HP/MP and restores from dead- for the whole party!
name: Tiny Heartfruit

description:
A legendary ambrosial fruit, grown in the Gardens of Eden.
Heals all HP/MP and restores from dead- for the whole party!
name: Heartfruit

description:
Unrefined rouge matter.
You'll need to refine it through alchemy if you want to use it.
name: Raw Rouge

description:
Refined rouge matter, radiating with the heat element.
Use in crafting of any type to add a touch of heat to things.
name: Rouge Essence

description:
Ultra-concentrated and refined rouge essence.
A few drops of this and anything you're crafting will radiate intense heat.
name: Pure Rouge

description:
Unrefined bleu matter.
You'll need to refine it through alchemy if you want to use it.
name: Raw Bleu

description:
Refined bleu matter, radiating with the liquid element.
Use in crafting of any type to add a splash of liquidity to things.
name: Bleu Essence

description:
Ultra-concentrated and refined bleu essence.
A few drops of this and anything you're crafting will become aqueous.
name: Pure Bleu

description:
Unrefined verte matter.
You'll need to refine it through alchemy if you want to use it.
name: Raw Verte

description:
Refined verte matter, radiating with the air element.
Use in crafting of any type to improve the flow of things.
name: Verte Essence

description:
Ultra-concentrated and refined verte essence.
A few drops of this and anything you're crafting will be light as a feather.
name: Pure Verte

description:
Unrefined jaune matter.
You'll need to refine it through alchemy if you want to use it.
name: Raw Jaune

description:
Refined jaune matter, radiating with the ground element.
Use in crafting of any type to add some grit to things.
name: Jaune Essence

description:
Ultra-concentrated and refined jaune essence.
A few drops of this and anything you're crafting will be solid as rock.
name: Pure Jaune

description:
Unrefined blanche matter.
You'll need to refine it through alchemy if you want to use it.
name: Raw Blanche

description:
Refined blanche matter, radiating with the energy element.
Use in crafting of any type to add a sense of absolute purity to things.
name: Blanche Essence

description:
Ultra-concentrated and refined blanche essence.
A few drops of this and anything you're crafting will become blessed.
name: Pure Blanche

description:
Unrefined noire matter.
You'll need to refine it through alchemy if you want to use it.
name: Raw Noire

description:
Refined noire matter, radiating with the void element.
Use in crafting of any type to add that missing something to things.
name: Noire Essence

description:
Ultra-concentrated and refined noire essence.
A few drops of this and anything you're crafting will become cursed.
name: Pure Noire

description:
Raw iron ore.
It can be used as-is, but removing impurities would improve the quality.
name: Iron Ore

description:
Forge-ready iron.
This is the most basic of basic, can be used to craft many things.
name: Iron Ingot

description:
Raw silver ore.
It can be used as-is, but removing impurities would improve the quality.
name: Silver Ore

description:
Forge-ready silver.
Silver gear has a natural effectiveness versus undead creatures.
name: Silver Ingot

description:
Raw bleu ore.
It can be used as-is, but removing impurities would improve the quality.
name: Bleu Ore

description:
Forge-ready bleu metal.
Bleu is an alchemized metal that is known for being sturdy.
name: Bleu Ingot

description:
Raw sandwraith ore.
It can be used as-is, but removing impurities would improve the quality.
name: Sandwraith Ore

description:
Forge-ready sandwraith metal.
Weapons forged from sandwraith metal are extremely sharp and lightweight.
name: Sandwraith Ingot

description:
Raw engle ore.
It can be used as-is, but removing impurities would improve the quality.
name: Engle Ore

description:
Forge-ready engle.
Engle is an alchemized metal that boasts incredible magical energy.
name: Engle Ingot

description:
Raw deep ore.
It can be used as-is, but removing impurities would improve the quality.
name: Deep Ore

description:
Forge-ready deep metal.
Deep metals are renowned worldwide for their effectiveness against constructs.
name: Deep Ingot

description:
Raw might ore.
It can be used as-is, but removing impurities would improve the quality.
name: Might Ore

description:
Forge-ready might metal.
Might metal gear tends to amplify attributes of the wearer.
name: Might Ingot

description:
Raw ultanium ore.
It can be used as-is, but removing impurities would improve the quality.
name: Ultanium Ore

description:
Forge-ready ultanium. The rarity alone makes this ingot worth millions,
in addition to the insane durability and sharpness. Literally unparalleled.
name: Ultanium Ingot

description:
This looks like a limb off of a plain ol' oak tree.
Can be manufactured into lumber.
name: Oak

description:
The standard in modern lumber, used since ancient times by all cultures.
Its versatility of use makes it extremely popular.
name: Oak Lumber

description:
This looks like a limb off of a Dreamy Willow.
Can be manufactured into lumber.
name: Dreamwood

description:
A somewhat uncommon type of lumber due to the dangers of its origin.
It appears to glow, so it might be magical.
name: Dream Lumber

description:
This looks like a limb off of a Negapine Tree.
Can be manufactured into lumber.
name: Negapine

description:
The trees on the Negative Peaks feel like they are made of ice!
As such, these trees make a great lumber for colder climates.
name: Nega Lumber

description:
This looks like a limb off of a Grimtooth Birch.
Can be manufactured into lumber.
name: Grimwood

description:
The stripy nature of this lumber gives off primal vibes.
Weapons made from this are sure to invoke fear in their prey.
name: Grim Lumber

description:
This looks like a limb off of a Subterranean Banyan.
Can be manufactured into lumber.
name: Subwood

description:
Short of "subterranean banyan lumber", this is unusually dark wood.
Its durability is unmatched of all Erocian woods.
name: Sub Lumber

description:
This looks like a limb off of an Hearty Dragontree.
Can be manufactured into lumber.
name: Heartwood

description:
Dragontree lumber of any kind is extremely rare due to its noxious sap.
With that in mind, anything made from this lumber also is lethally toxic.
name: Heart Lumber

description: A beautiful ruby with almost no imperfections.
name: Ruby

description:
An ultra-rare ruby bearing star-like molecule structure which
gives it a wildly different shape than a normal ruby in the wild.
name: Star Ruby

description: A sparkling emerald, shaped to be inlaid into other items.
name: Emerald

description:
When emeralds are introduced to certain environmental factors, their
insides can twist and contort, creating an extremely durable emerald.
name: Twist Emerald

description: A gorgeous topaz that glimmers a subtle yellow.
name: Topaz

description:
A topaz that can become a perfect sphere if deconstructed and
then reconstructed with a bit of alchemy.
name: Imperial Topaz

description: A generic crystalline gemstone. Quite durable.
name: Sapphire

description:
An ethereal sapphire is insanely rare, with only a few left in the galaxy.
It radiates a mysterious aura and has taken on a bit of a different look.
name: Ethereal Sapphire

description: A generic crystalline gemstone. Quite durable.
name: Crystal

description:
Through careful fusion techniques, one can fuse two particular types
of crystal into a single crystal without increasing the mass.
name: Power Crystal

description: The king of gems, a diamond has both beauty AND endurance.
name: Diamond

description:
Though blue at a glance, this diamond reflects all colors of
the rainbow depending on the angle and lighting.
name: Rainbow Diamond

description:
Not everything should rest directly in your infinite bag of holding. For those
cases, you should consider putting them in a container such as this.
name: Container

description:
A bundle of some of earthy, savory-smelling herbs.
Adding these to your dishes will surely add the umami you seek!
name: Earthy Herbs

description:
A bundle of some of fresh and crisp-smelling herbs.
Adding these to your dishes will surely add the freshness you seek!
name: Minty Herbs

description:
A bundle of some of fiery, and spicy-smelling herbs.
Adding these to your dishes will surely add the lava you seek!
name: Spicy Herbs

description: Your basic in H2O, bottled up for your RPG convenience.
name: Water

description:
Though its called a pepper, the capsaicin is fairly low.
Even the most spice-sensitive can usually tolerate these.
name: Bell Pepper

description:
A juicy and luscious tomato. Almost as versatile as a potato,
this can be used in all sorts of dishes.
name: Tomato

description:
A pod of green beans, right off the vine.
These are great for adding texture and healthiness to your cuisine.
name: Green Beans

description:
Usually rather tasteless, but goes great with salads or
burgers due to the variance of texture.
name: Lettuce

description:
Carrots are well-known for their rabbit consumers, but rabbits
if you added this to a stew, it would definitely add earthiness!
name: Carrot

description:
Your basic yellow onion. Slightly sweet, but has a delicate
aroma that wafts deep into your happy little nostrils.
name: Onion

description:
The most versatile of roots, the potato can be used for
so many things its an absolute atrocity you don't have 999 of them.
name: Potato

description:
Your basic variety of nut. What kind is that, you ask?
The nutty kind.
name: Nuts

description:
A generic mushroom with a cap that does mushroom things.
Grows up and looks gross, but can fill a variety of roles in food.
name: Mushrooms

description:
Sometimes known as a superfood, broccoli is a great addition
to any dish.
name: Broccoli

description:
A small bunch of blueberries providing the perfect amount of
sweetness and tart. Eating them straight is tempting.
name: Blueberries

description:
A juicy orange straight from the tree!
It can be used for all sorts of juices, or to add accent to meat.
name: Orange

description:
Though cheese has a multitude of subcategories, similar to
mushrooms, for the sake of this adventure, there is only "cheese".
name: Cheese

description:
This is a fish. This planet doesn't take the time to observe
the various kinds of fish like it does monsters.
name: Fish

description:
It is presumed that these eggs came from this planet's equivalent
of a chicken or something, because they are about the same shape and size.
name: Eggs

description:
The king of starches, can be used to make so many things that
its a miracle it exists everywhere you go.
name: Rice

description:
A single loaf of freshly baked sourdough bread.
The smell makes you drool a bit.
name: Bread

description:
One of the only fruits that appear to grow in this land.
Fortunately, it can be used for both its milk, and its flesh.
name: Coconut

description:
A golden yellow lemon, almost bursting with juice.
Though, you probably want to use the juice sparingly, its very tart.
name: Lemon

description:
An all-purpose seasoning salt of sorts. The precise blend is
a well-guarded secret of the chef who made it.
name: Seasoning

description:
Butter... such a legendary ingredient in its versatility of use
and flavor profile. You can use it for both cooking and baking.
name: Butter

description:
The wine itself tastes like ass to consume directly, but when
you cook with it, its like a whole different beast.
name: Cooking Wine

description:
An old hand-me-down utensil. Can be used to boil and stew a variety
of different soup-like dishes!
name: Soup Pot

description:
A fine cooking utensil. Some dishes require the ability to
stir the contents without your bare hands to produce sanitary results.
name: Spoon

description:
An old hand-me-down utensil. Can be used to saute, fry, or sear
a variety of different ingredients!
name: Frying Pan

description:
A fine cooking utensil. Some dishes require the finesse of
a turner like this to safely flip to the other side for even cooking.
name: Spatula

description:
A fine smithing tool. Some blueprints require a hammer
to do blacksmith things.
name: Hammer

description:
A fine smithing tool. Some blueprints call for steps that include
sticking your hands in the flames. These protect you from that.
name: Mitts

description:
A multi-purpose tool. It can be used to grab things from
a safe distance, or just lock things in place while you operate on them.
name: Gripper

description:
A common survival tool. You can't use this for fighting with, but
it would do well for precision-cutting fabric and the like while JAFTING.
name: Scissors

description:
A common survival tool. When things are tiny and/or hard to see,
use this and... well, you'll be able to see the tiny/hard-to-see things.
name: Eyeglass

description:
A rare survival tool. Some say the pen is mightier than the sword,
but have you ever tried to literally combat a swordsman with a pen? At least it writes.
name: Fountain Pen

description:
A small pile of smelling salts that will snap the whole party back from the dead.
Also heals some Life (15% + 150).
name: Smelling Salts

description:
Play the ukelele vigorously and destroy things with the power of sound.
The ukelele can destroy certain stone spires.
name: Ukelele

description:
An explosive that detonates after a few seconds.
Bombs can destroy walls that are already cracked.
name: Time Bomb

description:
A magical wand with a flame on the tip that never goes out.
The flame isn't hot or even dangerous to humanoids, but it lights special torches just right!
name: Red Wand

description:
Delivers a sudden but short-lived massive burst of electricity.
Can overload nearby electronic devices and systems.
name: Voltage Baton

description:
A special feather bestowed upon you by the Trainer Lord.
Using this will instantly transport your party to his Lounge.
name: Providence

description:
A nicely bundled rope that appears to be pulsing as though breathing...
Use this to get yourself across chasms and the like by striking specific targets.
name: Snake Rope

description:
The blueprint says: "Two-Handed Sword", "Basher", and "Bang Blaster".
If these were studied closely, the reader would surely learn how to JAFT these weapons.
name: Blueprint Scrap

description:
The blueprint says: "Knight's Axe", "Translucent Spire", and "Royal Slappers".
If these were studied closely, the reader would surely learn how to JAFT these weapons.
name: Blueprint Scrap

description:
A flux drive that is a deep ruby red, kinda like an .
Unlocks the "Critical Exchange" difficulty layer.
name: Flux Drive: Crimson
note: found at the end of the salt mines.

description:
A flux drive that is a vibrant orange, like an .
Unlocks the "Sturdy Looting" difficulty layer.
name: Flux Drive: Saffron

description:
A flux drive that is shockingly yellow, similar to a .
Unlocks the "????" difficulty layer.
name: Flux Drive: Lemon

description:
A flux drive that bears an unusual resemblence to the color of .
Unlocks the "????" difficulty layer.
name: Flux Drive: Viridian

description:
A flux drive that is bright like a rushing .
Unlocks the "????" difficulty layer.
name: Flux Drive: Aqua

description:
A flux drive of regal authority, flaunting its royal blueness like a .
Unlocks the "????" difficulty layer.
name: Flux Drive: Royal

description:
Increases the number of threads available to the spacial flux engine.
Increases \C[1]Max Layer Points by 2\C[0].
name: Flux Threadbooster

description:
It appears to be a small hand-written journal with some recipes in it:
\Item[164] and \Item[165] are described within.
name: Recipe Journal I

description:
A strange-looking pudding that is a delicacy in Erocy.
Seem to smell like oranges... but at least it heals life, magi, AND tech!
name: Erocian Pudding

description:
A classic Erocian dish, according to The Comfy Bear's innkeeper.
It is a strange honey-based soup with floating bits of vine in it.
name: Yellow Soup

description:
A classic Erocian dish, according to The Comfy Bear's innkeeper.
It seems simple enough: seasoned bearcat flank that has been grilled.
name: Grilled Bearcat

description:
A classic Erocian dish, according to The Comfy Bear's innkeeper.
A beautiful cod that has been panseared in butter.
name: Pan-seared Cod

description:
A classic Erocian dish, according to The Comfy Bear's innkeeper.
Some eggs that were cooked in that really old cheese you found.
name: Fried Cheesy Eggs

description:
An uncommon Erocian dish, according to nature lover.
A roll made from fried potatoes as the container and beef with cheese as the filling.
name: Potato Beef Cake

description:
An uncommon Erocian dish, according to nature lover.
Beautifully charred rib meat that has been seasoned to perfection. Would even revive the dead.
name: Charred Beef Ribs

description:
This is an amazing nut-based pie, derived from none other than the Dryad's
Acorns. The memories of the Dryad are so delicious that they purge all poisons.
name: Acorn Pie

description:
An uncommon Erocian dish, according to nature lover.
A strangely jiggly pilaf that smells much better than it looks.
name: Jelli Pilaf

description:
An uncommon Erocian dish, according to nature lover.
A spread of carrots that have been drizzled with a lemon butter before roasting.
name: Lemonroasted Carrots

description:
An uncommon Erocian dish, according to nature lover.
A tiny bowl of bisque crafted from a variety of wild fungus.
name: Mushroom Bisque

description:
A rare Erocian dish, according to nature lover.
A sumptuous stew with a never-before-seen amount of umami delivering %.
name: Tasty Stew

description:
A small pile of smelling salts that will snap the whole party back from the dead.
Also heals some Life (15% + 150).
name: Smelling Salts

description:
A bright and green salad, with vines that are still wriggling in it.
It is probably a good idea to eat it quick lest it eat you first.
name: Wilted Wolftrap Salad

description:
Apparently around Erocia, it is common to straight up eat coral.
However, this coral is questionably tender, almost as tender as the delicious cod it compliments.
name: Tender Coral and Cod

description:
Unlocks "Enchanter's Guile".
Earned from story progression.
name: Enchanter's Guile

description:
Unlocks "Fighter's Spirit".
Earned from story progression.
name: Fighter's Spirit

description:
Unlocks "Ghostly Presence".
Drops from ghosties in the Erocian Lair.
name: Ghostly Presence

description:
Unlocks "Erocian Strong Style".
Drops from erocian slimes in the Erocian Lair.
name: Erocian Strong Style

description:
Unlocks "Sting like a Bee".
Drops from various bees across the land.
name: Sting like a Bee

description:
Unlocks "Tentacular Touch".
Drops from various tentacles across the land.
name: Tentacular Touch

description:
Unlocks "Bearfisting It".
Drops from various bears across the land.
name: Bearfisting It

description:
Unlocks "Impish Insight".
Drops from various imps across the land.
name: Impish Insight

description:
Unlocks "Skies of the Cave".
Drops from various bats across the land.
name: Skies of the Cave

description:
Unlocks "Flame's Caress".
Drops from the Will'o'wisps in the Raevula Mines.
name: Flame's Caress

description:
Unlocks "Bullheaded".
Drops from various minotaurs across the land.
name: Bullheaded

description:
Unlocks "Otherworldly Dark".
Drops from various wraiths across the land.
name: Otherworldly Dark

description:
Unlocks "Pissed Off Sprout".
Drops from various sprouts across the land.
name: Pissed Off Sprout

description:
Unlocks "Flowing Fluids".
Drops from various jelli monsters across the land.
name: Flowing Fluids

description:
Unlocks "Fae's Scorn".
Drops from various faeries across the land.
name: Scorn of Fae

description:
Unlocks "Thief's Code".
Drops from the bandits in the Forest of Dreams.
name: Thief's Code

description:
Unlocks "Glutton's Dogma".
Drops from the werewolves in the Forest of Dreams.
name: Glutton's Dogma

description:
Unlocks "Burrow Burr".
Drops from the crawlers in the Forlorn Basin.
name: Burrow Burr

description:
Unlocks "Soak 'n' Spray".
Drops from the goobats in the Forlorn Basin.
name: Soak 'n' Spray

description:
Unlocks "Stone's Secret".
Drops from the stonefurs in the Forlorn Basin.
name: Stone's Secret

description:
Unlocks "Goo Tango".
Drops from the Slime in the Forlorn Basin.
name: Goo Tango

description:
Unlocks "Bloody Embrace".
Drops from various tentacles across the land.
name: Bloody Embrace

description:
Unlocks "Ironfist of Iron".
Drops from various minotaurs across the land.
name: Ironfist of Iron

description:
Unlocks "Boney Situation".
Drops from the skeletors in the outer cliffs.
name: Boney Situation

description:
Unlocks "Spinal Control".
Drops from the skeledoggos in the outer cliffs.
name: Spinal Control

description:
Unlocks "Princely Flourish".
Drops from the prince cobra in the outer cliffs.
name: Princely Flourish

description:
Unlocks "Pressure Points".
Drops from the penetrators in the meandering way.
name: Pressure Points

description:
Unlocks "Spooky Aura".
Drops from the spookys in the Earthen Layer.
name: Spooky Aura

description:
Unlocks "Mostly-Seeing Eyes".
Drops from the Ropers in the Earthen Layer.
name: Mostly-Seeing Eyes

description:
Unlocks "River Runs Deep".
Drops from the kappa shaman in the Forlorn Basin.
name: River Runs Deep

description:
Unlocks "Skittering Death".
Drops from the rats at the Erocian Isthmus.
name: Resourceful Ratactics

description:
Unlocks "Dragonic Sacrifice".
Drops from the lesser dargins at the Erocian Isthmus.
name: Dragonic Sacrifice

description:
Unlocks "Lamian Royalty".
Drops from the lamias at the Erocian Isthmus.
name: Lamian Royalty

description:
Unlocks "Temporal Tactics".
Drops from the phasing slimes at the Erocian Isthmus.
name: Temporal Tactics

description:
Unlocks "Kappan Dirty Tricks".
Drops from the Kappa Myrmidons at the Deluge Valley.
name: Kappan Dirty Tricks

description:
Unlocks "Outlaw's Shortcuts".
Drops from the Outlaws at the Deluge Valley.
name: Outlaw's Shortcuts

description:
Unlocks "Orcan Obediance".
Drops from the Orc Minions and Orc Fighters in the mines.
name: Orcan Obediance

description:
Unlocks "Orcan Stormcalling".
Drops from the Orc Magi and Orc Cheiftains in the mines.
name: Orcan Stormcalling

description:
Unlocks "Heated Girth".
Drops from the Heated Titans at the Volcanis Grotto.
name: Heated Girth

description:
Unlocks "Redhot Blobbing".
Drops from Living Lava at the Volcanis Grotto.
name: Redhot Blobbing

description:
Unlocks "Crimson Gaze".
Drops from Redeye at the Volcanis Grotto.
name: Crimson Gaze

description:
Unlocks "Crabtastical Crunchiness".
Drops from Crimson Vice at the Volcanis Grotto.
name: Crabtastical Crunchiness

description:
Unlocks "Living Volcano".
Drops from Magma Worms at the Volcanis Grotto.
name: Living Volcano
